programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring you reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping today's complex economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld break down the day's top market-moving stories and trading action around the closing bell.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.
